name: A Safe Space
description:
A Safe Space is a first person psychological horror game.

Controls

Controls are displayed in the table below and can also be viewed in game by selecting the "Instructions" option in the main menu.

MoveW, A, S, D or arrow keysSprintHold left shiftCrouchHold left controlInteract with objectFShoot flare gun / Swipe key cardLeft mouse buttonZoomRight mouse buttonToggle flashlightEReload flare gunRSwitch ItemMouse scroll wheel or 1, 2, 3, 4Pause GameEscape

Please note that the Mac and Linux builds has not been tested yet. Any feedback on how the game runs on those builds  will be much appreciated. 

Let us know if there are any issues with installing/downloading the game.

YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGnlKPFQVidPZPWU2OuYqJA

We would love to hear your feedback in the comments.

Enjoy.
